p.s: The speech, given by Barack Obama on the 7th November 2007, is about the American Dream and that the Americans can reach the American Dream.

The list of contrasts in line 9 and 10 In big cities and small towns, among men and women, young and old, black, white and brown has the effect to create a strong comunitycommunity spirit for all Americans.
The story telling in line 13-15 has the Effecteffect that Obama is more personal to the Americans.

The repetition in the beginning of a sentence in line 12 and 16 These are dreams that drove my... is importimportant to show to the Americans, that they could be the first Generationgeneration that reaches the American Dream.

Another Repetitionrepetition in line 19 and 20 no matter what color you are, no matter werewhere you're from, no matter how much money you have, shows the target of the American Dream and that every person can reach the same.
To put it in a nutshell, Barack Obama wants to built a united America that can reach the American Dream.
